name: HOPE - Humanitarian OPErations
goal:
Bringing HOPE to the invisibles

Some emergencies are more likely to receive the international attention and thus aid.

However, most of the overlooked crisis are severe, protracted humanitarian situations caused by natural disasters or armed conflicts, which have inevitable consequences on the affected communities, who are often among the most vulnerable and impoverished.

HOPE – Humanitarian OPErations is a Belgian humanitarian private foundation constituted in May 2017, which aims to provide aid to and improve the resilience of the most vulnerable and less visible beneficiaries.


Vision
A world where every person has the power to build his own future without any form of discrimination based on his gender, age, ethnicity and religion.

Mission
HOPE aims to transform situations of social and economic vulnerability into individual and collective growth opportunities, through projects of emergency aid, cooperation and development that promote autonomy, resilience and sustainability.
